channel.description: Recent content in Eating Healthy on Pandaqi Tutorials

item.title: Introduction
item.description: Much of the information out there about eating healthy isn’t necessarily wrong. But it focuses on one specific thing, ignoring that your body is a large group of systems.

item.title: Water
item.description: Water is more important than food. You can go for weeks without eating, but can only go a few days without drinking water.

item.title: Body Types & Metrics
item.description: When trying to improve your diet (or general health), you need some way to check if you’re actually doing it right.

item.title: The Purpose of Food
item.description: It’s funny to me how often people give diet advice without giving or considering the actual goal someone wants to achieve.

item.title: General Guidelines
item.description: Some general diet guidelines have been established a long time ago. They are, as always, imperfect. But they provide a good enough starting point.

item.title: Nutrients
item.description: This is an area of research that will most likely change every few years. There was a time when every product tried to remove “fat”, because everyone thought it was bad and terrible.

item.title: Sugar
item.description: I have talked a lot about what you should (consciously) do. This chapter is partly inspired by the reverse question: “what bad eating habits do most people have, without even knowing how bad they are?

item.title: Freshness
item.description: So far, in this guide, I’ve frequently mentioned discarding artifical products. It’s one of the subtle ways in which people ruin their diet, but there’s a simple explanation.

item.title: Fasting
item.description: Previous chapter talked about the importance of a natural lifestyle. Fasting has recently become popular, but as opposed to many other fitness trends, it actually has merit.

item.title: Our second brain
item.description: Let me make an assumption about you. You’ve had a stomach ache in your life, at least once. And when that happened, or when it was at its worst, you couldn’t do anything, right?

item.title: How to apply all this advice?
item.description: This is the major component of eating healthy that most guides leave out. All the advice is nice. Buy fermented foods.

item.title: Conclusion
item.description: I’ve said everything I wanted to say. That might be disappointing to hear. Maybe you were expecting some really strict guidelines, or schedule, or diet plans.
